function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Acceleration of adoption of telehealth and home care","Impact":"Increased risk of cyber attacks and data breaches in telehealth systems","Mitigation":"Implementation of robust cybersecurity measures, regular security audits, and staff training on data security","Technologies":"Cybersecurity systems, encryption technologies, and secure authentication methods","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, and administrators","Owner":"Healthcare organizations and technology companies"},{"Description":"Use of IoT and related technologies in healthcare sector","Impact":"Vulnerability to security breaches and data privacy violations in IoT devices and systems","Mitigation":"Regular security updates, encryption of data, and compliance with data privacy regulations","Technologies":"Security protocols, encryption techniques, and data privacy tools","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, and administrators","Owner":"Healthcare organizations and technology companies"},{"Description":"Confinement measures and tracking of COVID-19 patients using GPS and other tools","Impact":"Privacy concerns and potential misuse of location tracking data","Mitigation":"Adherence to data protection laws, informed consent for tracking, and anonymization of location data","Technologies":"Anonymization techniques, data protection frameworks, and informed consent processes","People":"General public and individuals subject to tracking","Owner":"Government agencies and public health authorities"}]}
